main event: On July 1, 1959, unidentified lights were observed in the sky over New Church, Virginia.
interesting points: The lights appeared and disappeared suddenly, exhibiting erratic movements and patterns., Observers were reluctant to estimate the height of the lights, noting that some chased them in automobiles indicating a belief they were low., The lights were described as circular and off-white in color, resembling a projection but moving too erratically for that explanation., Multiple observers reported seeing the lights perform a crescent pattern, with varying speeds and disappearing one after another., Reports were sent to the U.S. Air Force, and they requested additional information and questionnaires from the witnesses.
witness description: various residents of New Church, Virginia
